meanings.definition: A person who snivels or whines constantly.
meanings.sent1: The sniveler in the class always complained about everything.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a sniveler and face your problems with courage.
meanings.sent3: The sniveler at the party kept asking for more snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her brother was such a sniveler, always seeking attention.
meanings.sent5: The image of a sniveler is someone who is always unhappy and dissatisfied.

meanings.definition: To behave in a whining or tearful manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop snivelering and try to solve the issue calmly.
meanings.sent2: She tends to sniveler whenever things don't go her way.
meanings.sent3: The puppy snivelers when it doesn't get its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The toddler snivelers every time he has to take a bath.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled like a sniveler on a stormy night.
